attributes.action: Mandate Family Evidence be Crucial in all Mental Health Act Assessments
attributes.additional_details: This systemic failure is based on miseducation. Repeatedly, patients successfully mask severe mental illness (like schizophrenia) for an hour of assessment. This single denial then invalidates decades of family reports. This failure risks lives. Patient gets sectioned only after police intervene due to public disturbance; professionals ignore family reports hours before. We need a system prioritising family insight and recognising that the highest form of suffering is often hidden.
attributes.background: We need MHA professionals to prioritise family evidence over brief patient assessments that often accept masked symptom denial. Systemic negligence invalidates years of family reports, risking lives. We must recognise that the highest form of suffering is often hidden.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Require family involvement in the care of adults with severe mental illness" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750399
